data.title: Christopher Ragland
data.text:
American actor

Christopher Glynn Ragland (born June 18, 1984) is an American actor.

Early life

[edit]

Ragland was born in Winnetka, Illinois on June 18, 1984.[citation needed]

Career

[edit]

Ragland has provided voices for numerous video games including Driver: San Francisco.[1] He also starred in the documentary series, I Shouldn't Be Alive, as Travis Wright.

He joined the voice cast of Thomas & Friends in 2015. He voices Percy in the US dub taking over from Martin T. Sherman, who also voiced Thomas. Ragland also voices the Troublesome Trucks in both the UK and US taking over from Ben Small,[2] and Trevor in the US. His wife, Rachael Miller, joined the cast of the series in 2018, and voices new main cast regular Rebecca in addition to numerous extra supporting and minor characters.

Aside from Thomas & Friends, Ragland has also lent his voice to several other animated projects including the films Inside Out and Minions, the English dubs of Sherlock Yack, My Knight and Me and Scary Larry and an episode of The Amazing World of Gumball.

Personal life

[edit]

Ragland currently resides in London, England. He was married to voice actress Rachael Miller who also voiced Rebecca and several characters in the twenty second season of Thomas & Friends and the movie Thomas and Friends: Big World! Big Adventures!.
